name: Kaiho
description:
Story

Renne doesn't dare to fall in love. Something happened in the past, but he can't remember what. It is time to delve deeper to his memories, to find out.

How to play

You play the game by clicking "Run game" and it opens new tab. Story itself is quite linear, where the end has some branches.

Blue text is what protagonist says. To progress, you simply click them with a mouse.

Team

J-H Reedlake: Writing, Programming
Lexa.us: Art, Programming

Background

Game was made for AdventureX Game Jam 2020. Theme was "A Good Time"

Game was written with mentality "First idea is the best idea" and first idea that came to was "Reminiscing good old times"

Usually good old times include past love. People move on, but what can happen if person doesn't?

This is also J-H's first time writing narrative in many years.

Lexa is happy to be working with her dear friend as an illustrator and can't wait to share more progress as time goes forward!

Going forward

We have plans to update the presentation to more detailed. Because of real life and limited game jam time, we went with simple style and fewer pictures.

Software used

Made with Twine 2.3.9

Formatting Harlowe 3.1.0

Microsoft Word and Google Docs

Procreate for iPad
